abstract: Art researcher from Italy testifies at trial of Hugues-Denver Akassy in Manhattan, contending that chance meeting with him led to a bizarre on-again, off-again acquaintanceship that eventually turned frightening; Akassy faces charges of stalking and harassing the woman, along with several other crimes that include sexual assault, against four other women.
snippet: A woman testified Monday about how a chance meeting with a man named Hugues-Denver Akassy led to a bizarre on-again, off-again acquaintanceship that, she said, turned frightening.
lead_paragraph: A woman testified Monday about how a chance meeting with a man named Hugues-Denver Akassy led to a bizarre on-again, off-again acquaintanceship that, she said, turned frightening.
